original_title: Sri Lanka Insurance shines at SLIM National Sales Awards 2023
original_body_lines: The sales team of Sri Lanka Insurance was awarded at SLIM National Sales Awards 2023 for their dedication and commitment in achieving excellence as sales professionals.

Nilanka Wadduwage and Achintha Jayawardena won Gold and Silver awards respectively in the Sales Supervisor Category – Insurance sector (General) whilst W. G. Tusitha Kumara won a Merit Award in Sales Supervisor Category – Insurance sector (Life).

These accolades not only highlight the dedication, expertise, and impact that these professionals bring in to their roles but also emphasizes the exemplary performance of Sri Lanka Insurance in the competitive market. The awards serve as a testament to the organization’s commitment to excellence and innovation in the insurance sector.
The prestigious SLIM National Sales Awards 2023 was held on the 14th November 2023 at the Monarch Imperial to celebrate sales professionals from numerous industries.
